'''''Amon Hen'' 149''' is the one-hundred-and-forty-ninth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in January [[1998]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''Untitled''
** By: [[John Ellison]]
* Editorial
** By: Andrew McMurry
* Contents
* Bywater Announcements
** By: Malcolm Lindley
* Entings Announcement
** By: Trevor Reynolds
* Announcements
* [[Oxonmoot]] '98
* AGM '98
* Report: SFX Great Book Award
** By: [[Chris Crawshaw]]
* Ode to Lester Simons
** By: Dwalin
* Review: An Evening in Rivendell CD
** By: Richard Crawshaw
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: Annie Haward
* Of Cauldrons and Calderas
** By: [[Ruth Lacon]]
* The Society Library
** By: [[Sally Kennett]]
* Letters Pages
* Artwork: Bombadil speaks to Old Man Willow
** By: Peter Dawson
* Entings
** By: Lucy Ritchie
* Hildifons's Half of Amon Hen
** By: [[Sumner Gary Hunnewell|Gary Hunnewell]]
* Mathom
** By: Ian Collier & Anke Buttner
* Annie's Allsorts
** By: Annie Haward
* Tolk Folk
* New Members/Committee
